entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #50598
  • CSS loading issue in Blazor Server app when Changing environment variable to "Production" #50595
  • Re-evaluate enhanced nav to non-Blazor endpoints #50591
  • SSR and Fetch with Azure Front Door #50587
  • Blazor webassembly does not initialize components in the `LayoutComponentBase` after webassembly resources downloaded. #50585
  • Validation for MetadataType using Custom validation attribute #50584
  • User's Email Claim is always returned emtpy #50583
  • [Blazor] Changing a parameter with default value to nullable causes it's name not to be unique when using hot reload #50579

Closed

  • Introduce a Shared DynamicObject for Cross-Controller Data Exchange #50559
  • With rc1, an error occurs when a custom layout is needed. #50597
  • .NET 7 regression generic array parameters 35980 #48526
  • PreventDefault not working in next 13 #50581
  • ASP.NET Core Module fails to load the runtime when the Null Service is stopped #46544
    8.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Versions.props to latest Microsoft.Identity.Web 2.13.4 #50594
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Implement IDirectoryContents on ManifestDirectoryInfo #50586
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Update Versions.props to latest Microsoft.Identity.Web #50582
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50596
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Form mapping support for select multiple, logging, DataMember and other improvements/cleanups #50431
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] Obsolete Router.PreferExactMatches #50545
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50580
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump actions/checkout from 3 to 4 #50590
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Update gRPC packages for .NET 8 templates #50568
    area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 8.0-rc2
  • Fix IIS OutOfProc sometimes creating multiple app instances after recycle #50535
    feature-iis, area-networking, 8.0-rc2
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50576
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, area-networking, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Add feature to expose IIS hosting details #50443
    area-networking
  • WIP: Add automated Blazor WebView test using Photino #50347
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update Blazor WebAssembly template #50554
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Startup API cleanups #50571
    area-blazor
  • Enhanced navigation redirections. Make form enhancement opt-in. #50551
    area-blazor
  • Fix Set size in HttpLoggingOptions #50426
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Persist Prerendered State #50373
    area-blazor
  • Support resolving IFormFile in complex form mapping #50537
    area-blazor
  • Add ProblemDetials.Extensions to ControllerBase.Problem and ControllerBase.ValidationProblem #50204
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
